title: Looking For Supp & Top Main. High Plat/Diam+ Pref
body:
Hey guys, I am putting together a team of 5 who specifically main the roles they will be playing in, and can play several champs in that role. We are laid back, toxic free and are willing to improve. Through the losses we will evaluate what went wrong and try not to make the same mistakes. Prefer people who play often and has comms.

Thankyou.

Add IGN; Rekt Nerd

replies.body: I'm keen, only Plat III right now though. Support main and can play all of the champions in the role. IGN - Cuddly Panda.
I was plat1 3 weeks ago. Now I'm plat 5. Just been playing too much teemo. I'm a support/mid main. Ign hi im benju

Hey man, I don't fit the requirements of plat/diamond but I am G5 and a top man that can use all the top lane champs. So if you want to search me up and consider me as ur player or a sub leave a message for me :)
IGN: Xenomazul
